participant_1.name: Aiden
participant_1.personality: A curious and determined individual who enjoys gaming and has a unique set of abilities.
participant_1.background: i'm a boy. i can move objects with my mind. i had to have a transplant. i was born with my heart outside my body.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: A passionate musician with a nurturing spirit, balancing her dreams with the responsibilities of being a parent.
participant_2.background: my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i'm a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.

content.text: hi how are you today? i'm well.
